title: The Future of Language Models in Education
excerpt: Language models have rapidly evolved from experimental technologies to powerful tools that are reshaping numerous industries, and education is no exception. As these models become more sophisticated, they're poised to transform how we teach, learn, and assess knowledge in fundamental ways.

title: Data Storytelling: Making Numbers Speak
excerpt: In an era of information overload, the ability to transform raw data into compelling narratives has become an invaluable skill. Data storytelling combines analytical rigor with narrative techniques to make complex information accessible, memorable, and actionable.
